upload.title: Upload Video
upload.description: Share your content with the community
upload.supportedFormats: Supported formats: MP4, MOV, AVI, MKV, WebM, HEVC (max. 500MB, 20 min)
upload.uploadSuccessDescription: "{{title}}" has been uploaded successfully to your channel.
upload.uploadErrorDescription: There was a problem processing your file. Please try again.
upload.incompleteFieldsDescription: Please complete the title, select a category and a video before continuing.
upload.userNotAuthenticatedDescription: You must sign in to upload videos.

auth.loginDescription: Enter your credentials to sign in
auth.registerDescription: Enter your details to sign up
auth.confirmAdult: and confirm I am over 18 years old
auth.birthDateHelp: This information helps us personalize your experience
auth.minimumAgeError: You must be over 18 years old to register on this platform
auth.accountCreatedSuccess: Account created successfully. Check your email to verify your account before signing in.
auth.emailVerificationRequired: You must verify your email before signing in. Check your inbox.
auth.underageMessage: You cannot access this platform. You must be over 18 years old to use our services.
auth.recoverPasswordDescription: Enter your email to recover your password
auth.passwordResetEmailSent: An email with password recovery instructions has been sent.
auth.ageVerificationDescription: To comply with our policies, we need to verify that you are over 18 years old
auth.whyVerifyAge: Why do we need to verify your age?
auth.ageVerificationExplanation: Our platform contains adult content and we comply with international regulations that require age verification for users over 18 years old.
auth.enterBirthDate: Please enter your date of birth
auth.mustAcceptTerms: You must accept the terms and conditions to continue
auth.mustBe18Plus: You must be over 18 years old to use this platform
auth.ageVerifiedSuccess: Your age has been verified successfully
auth.ageVerificationError: There was a problem verifying your age. Please try again.
auth.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 8 characters long
auth.passwordLowercase: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter
auth.passwordUppercase: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter
auth.passwordNumber: Password must contain at least one number

settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Manage your account and app preferences
settings.notificationsDescription: Customize which notifications you want to receive
settings.twoFactorDescription: Add an extra layer of security
settings.googlePasswordManaged: Your password is managed from your Google account
settings.newVideosDescription: Notifications when new videos are uploaded
settings.commentsDescription: Notifications for comments on your videos
settings.newFollowersDescription: Notifications when you have new followers
settings.deleteAccountDescription: Permanently delete your account and all associated data
settings.deleteConfirmDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete your account and all associated data from our servers.
settings.changesSavedSuccess: All changes have been saved successfully
settings.avatarUpdatedSuccess: Your profile picture has been updated successfully
settings.avatarUpdateError: Could not update your profile picture
settings.accountDeletedSuccess: Your account has been permanently deleted
settings.changePasswordModalDescription: To change your password, you need to confirm your current password
settings.confirmPasswordRequired: You must confirm the new password
settings.newPasswordSameAsCurrent: New password must be different from current password

errors.accessDeniedMessage: You don't have permission to access this section. Contact the administrator if you think this is an error.

firebase.auth/too-many-requests: Too many attempts. Try again later
firebase.WEAK_PASSWORD: Password must be at least 6 characters
firebase.USER_NOT_FOUND: No account found with this email
firebase.TOO_MANY_ATTEMPTS_TRY_LATER: Too many failed attempts. Try again later

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: We're here to help you. Get in touch with us for any questions or support.
contact.contactInfoDescription: Multiple ways to communicate with us
contact.normalUserDescription: Access to videos and featured content
contact.formDescription: Fill out the form and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.
contact.fullNameHelp: Enter your real name for better communication
contact.userTypeHelp: This helps us direct your query to the right team
contact.subject: Subject
contact.subjectHelp: A brief summary of your message
contact.messageHelp: Provide all relevant details to help you better
contact.incompleteFieldsDescription: Please fill in all form fields.
contact.messageSentDescription: Thank you for contacting us. We'll respond soon.
contact.fillAllFields: Please fill in all form fields.

home.subtitle: The ultimate platform for content creators
home.description: Discover, share and enjoy unlimited videos

ageVerification.title: Age Verification Required
ageVerification.description: You must be of legal age to access this content. By continuing, you confirm that you meet the legal requirements.
ageVerification.warning: This site contains content for a community over 18 years old
ageVerification.subtitle: To access this site
ageVerification.legalText: This site is intended exclusively for adults over 18 years old. By accessing, you accept that you meet the age requirements in your jurisdiction.
